title: Affliction
description: Three little words are all it takes to rip his world apart. Lost in his own affliction, Sy has been living in a darkness that he doesn't ever want to let go of. Until she arrives and shines her light so bright that nothing else mattered.She was only in it for the chase, for the thrill of capturing the unattainable.But what happens when her world shatters around her, spiraling her into the darkness beside him?Can his affliction be her resurrection?Or will two lost souls living in the depths of deception let it destroy them?
author: River Savage
